body_html:
I implemented torch.stack a week ago or so. It's exactly cat + unsqueeze.

If you find yourself often iterating over these loops that need a squeeze you can write an iterator that does it and wrap the original one in it. But I agree it's worth adding a flag to chunk and split

body:
I implemented torch.stack a week ago or so. It's exactly cat + unsqueeze.

If you find yourself often iterating over these loops that need a squeeze you can write an iterator that does it and wrap the original one in it. But I agree it's worth adding a flag to chunk and split
